name: Floppy Bird
overview: This is an Amiga interpretation of the phone game - Fappy Birds. It is entirely programmed in Amiblitz 2. How far can you get? On the title screen either click the mouse, press the space bar or joystick/pad fire button. Which ever you click will become your chosen method of control for that game (please note every time you return to the title screen you can choose a different control method). Using your chosen control method, fly the bird above and through the pipes. Made by Havie Spring for Havsoft in 2014.
